PathOfBuilding.Notes:
==================== = = = VIDEO GUIDE = = = ====================
The detailed video guide can be found here: https://youtu.be/4hPwqzAaljo
==================== = = = HOW TO USE = = = ====================
- Navigate to "Tree" tab then choose a passive tree in the bottom-left dropdown menu (next to "About"), according to your progress. - Adjust your current character level at the top - Put on and edit example gear or import your own stuff with the Import/Export Build feature. - Adjust gem levels and quality, and enable optional gems if used. - Configure anything relevant in the Configuration tab.
==================== = = = IMPORTANT = = = ====================
- Activate Flasks to see their impact on DPS or defense. - Gems that don't need quality or need to stay at a certain level are shown like that, all others are defaulted at 20/20.
==================== = = = GEAR = = = ====================
** Gear is split into three tiers: basic, mid-tier and best-in-slot. As a general rule of thumb prices increase significantly with each tier, but so do the benefits that the items bring. ** POE Trade search links:
^7^7^8^9^1^2======= WEAPON =======^7
Basic weapon: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/LJp5WZun Mid-tier weapon: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/YBJWpXIY Best-in-slot weapon: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/8BGzbEvcV
^7^3^3^7^2======= QUIVER =======^7
Basic quiver: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/2LRpl40hk Mid-tier quiver: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ultimatum/a6P5KKKHe Best-in-slot quiver: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/E9vaYwLS5
^2======= HELMET =======^2^2^6^6^1^8^0^8^7^6^7
Basic/mid-tier helmet DPS option: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/6lM299cG Basic/mid-tier helmet balanced option: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/2KJX0DYck Best-in-slot helmet (Asenath's Chant): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/3ql7n0i5
^7^5^6^2======= BODY ARMOUR =======^3^3^8^7
Basic body armour: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/7X4KG3Ru5 Mid-tier body armour (Kintsugi): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/A4GQs9 Mid-tier body armour (Yriel's Fostering): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/d8PwDj5IJ Best-in-slot body armour: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/lV2JrdrcV
^2======= GLOVES =======^2^7
Basic gloves: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/Y9enLWOIY Mid-tier gloves: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/GnpLME8Ib Best-in-slot gloves: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/poyBkWJS0
^2======= BOOTS =======^2^7
Best-in-slot boots (Darkray Vectors): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/RlX5k6Oh7
^2======= BELT =======^7
Basic belt: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/40JQRDvH9 Mid-tier belt: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/QdDezr7Cw Best-in-slot belt: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/n38BY3zT0
^3^2======= AMULET =======^7
Best-in-slot amulet (Xoph's Blood): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/3n2KU5
^2======= RINGS =======^7
Basic ring: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/drYPLVbiJ Mid-tier / Best-in-slot ring: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/LJ8eO3YHn
^3^2======= JEWELS =======^7
Combat Focus Viridian Jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/nlKbeMu0 Combat Focus Crimson Jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/j9ebOrSX
Blind on hit Abyss jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/QdpqY3pCw
3-mod jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/E9vGDzRS5 4-mod jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/8BG0pR8sV
1-mod Watcher's Eye: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ultimatum/lKK8wUV 2-mod Watcher's Eye: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/w74vkdCb
^2======= CLUSTER JEWELS =======^7^6^7
Large cluster: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/m3WyrrLI6 Medium cluster: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/44EL3LkC9
^3^2======= FLASKS =======^7
You need to ensure you cover Curse immunity (Warding suffix), Freeze Immunity (Heat suffix) as well as Bleed removal (Staunching suffix) on the flasks. Optimal setup:
> Seething + Divine Life Flask + of Staunching > Experimenter + Diamond Flask + of Warding > Dying Sun > Cinderswallow Urn > The Wise Oak (or Bottled Faith if you can afford it)
